derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (in the sense 'partnership'): from Latin, from consors 'sharing, partner' (see consort)

entry.tran: (若干人或公司组成的)财团，联合企业
entry.def: A consortium is a group of people or firms who have agreed to co-operate with each other.

example.ex: The consortium includes some of the biggest building contractors in Britain.
example.tran: 该联合企业包括英国最大的一些建筑承包商。
